stories.Title: NASA's ShadowCam is key for the Artemis missions
stories.Description: The highly sensitive optical camera has captured breathtaking images of the Moon's permanently shadowed regions, discovering potential landing sites for future lunar missions.
stories.Tweet: NASA's ShadowCam is key for the Artemis missions 📦 The highly sensitive optical camera has captured breathtaking images of the Moon's permanently shadowed regions, discovering potential landing sites for future lunar missions. #NASA https://gizmodo.com/moon-shadowed-craters-pockets-water-ice-shadowcam-1850396661

stories.Title: The Starlink expansion continues…
stories.Description: On Thursday, SpaceX is scheduled to launch another Falcon 9 rocket from Cape Canaveral which will deploy 56 satellites into orbit.
stories.Tweet: The Starlink expansion continues… 📦 On Thursday, SpaceX is scheduled to launch another Falcon 9 rocket from Cape Canaveral which will deploy 56 satellites into orbit. #spaceX https://www.space.com/spacex-starlink-launch-group-5-6

stories.Title: Watch NASA's live coverage of the Dragon port relocation!
stories.Description: SpaceX Dragon spacecraft's docking port is to be relocated on May 6th by four crew members aboard the International Space Station to make way for an upcoming cargo spacecraft.
stories.Tweet: Watch NASA's live coverage of the Dragon port relocation! 📦 SpaceX Dragon spacecraft's docking port is to be relocated on May 6th by four crew members aboard the International Space Station to make way for an upcoming cargo spacecraft. #NASA https://www.nasa.gov/press-release/nasa-sets-coverage-for-dragon-port-relocation-on-space-station

stories.Title: Tesla's presence in Nevada grows
stories.Description: As part of its effort to scale up production capacity and expand its battery supply chain, the company is building a new "Lithium Lab" in Nevada.
stories.Tweet: Tesla's presence in Nevada grows 📦 As part of its effort to scale up production capacity and expand its battery supply chain, the company is building a new "Lithium Lab" in Nevada. #tesla https://electrek.co/2023/05/03/tesla-lithium-lab-nevada/

stories.Title: Ford drops prices again
stories.Description: The automaker has cut prices for its Mustang Mach-E for the second time this year and announced a new battery technology for the standard-range models that aim to increase power and range.
stories.Tweet: Ford drops prices again 📦 The automaker has cut prices for its Mustang Mach-E for the second time this year and announced a new battery technology for the standard-range models that aim to increase power and range. #ford https://arstechnica.com/cars/2023/05/ford-boosts-mustang-mach-e-range-and-drops-price-as-profits-grow-20/

stories.Title: We are approaching a passwordless future
stories.Description: Making it easy and secure for users to sign in to apps and websites without having to remember difficult passwords, passkeys are now available for Google accounts.
stories.Tweet: We are approaching a passwordless future 📦 Making it easy and secure for users to sign in to apps and websites without having to remember difficult passwords, passkeys are now available for Google accounts. #google https://blog.google/technology/safety-security/the-beginning-of-the-end-of-the-password/

stories.Title: Google targets Ohio for its new data centers
stories.Description: The tech giant has announced plans to build two data centers in Columbus and Lancaster to support its AI technology.
stories.Tweet: Google targets Ohio for its new data centers 📦 The tech giant has announced plans to build two data centers in Columbus and Lancaster to support its AI technology. #google https://apnews.com/article/google-ohio-data-centers-technology-0fa42a92e4bb967afeba9c11070620ed

stories.Title: Say hello to Mojo!
stories.Description: A new programming language has arrived, and it is designed to combine the strengths of Python and systems programming in order to bridge the gap between research and production.
stories.Tweet: Say hello to Mojo! 📦 A new programming language has arrived, and it is designed to combine the strengths of Python and systems programming in order to bridge the gap between research and production. #programming https://www.modular.com/mojo

stories.Title: This startup is set to transform battery production
stories.Description: The creation of solid-state batteries using 3D printing by Sakuu is expected to revolutionize traditional battery manufacturing while reducing environmental impact.
stories.Tweet: This startup is set to transform battery production 📦 The creation of solid-state batteries using 3D printing by Sakuu is expected to revolutionize traditional battery manufacturing while reducing environmental impact. #startups https://www.thecooldown.com/green-tech/sakuu-3d-printing-solid-state-batteries/

stories.Title: Microsoft unveils the Pegasus program
stories.Description: The launch of this program expands the company's Startup Founders Hub and provides funding, resources, and expert advice to products that fill a market need.
stories.Tweet: Microsoft unveils the Pegasus program 📦 The launch of this program expands the company's Startup Founders Hub and provides funding, resources, and expert advice to products that fill a market need. #microsoft https://techcrunch.com/2023/05/03/microsoft-launches-pegasus-program-for-startups-awarding-up-to-350000-in-credits/

stories.Title: Midjourney 5.1 is now available
stories.Description: Promising better results than ever before, the latest version of Midjourney features a new moderation system and high-quality images with simple prompts.
stories.Tweet: Midjourney 5.1 is now available 📦 Promising better results than ever before, the latest version of Midjourney features a new moderation system and high-quality images with simple prompts. #midjourney https://the-decoder.com/midjourney-now-has-an-easy-mode-and-a-new-ai-moderation-system/

title: Microsoft announces the Pegasus program, Passkeys are now available in Google, Midjourney 5.1 is here
